actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE public."events" SET
		"title" = '{{update_form.fieldState.title.isVisible ? update_form.formData.title : update_form.sourceData.title}}',
		"created_date" = '{{update_form.fieldState.created_date.isVisible ? update_form.formData.created_date : update_form.sourceData.created_date}}',
    "modified_date" = '{{update_form.fieldState.modified_date.isVisible ? update_form.formData.modified_date : update_form.sourceData.modified_date}}',
		"detected_date" = '{{update_form.fieldState.detected_date.isVisible ? update_form.formData.detected_date : update_form.sourceData.detected_date}}',
		"hazard_type_id" = '{{update_form.fieldState.hazard_type_id.isVisible ? update_form.formData.hazard_type_id : update_form.sourceData.hazard_type_id}}',
		"parent_event_id" = '{{update_form.fieldState.parent_event_id.isVisible ? update_form.formData.parent_event_id : update_form.sourceData.parent_event_id}}',
		"status_id" = '{{update_form.fieldState.status_id.isVisible ? update_form.formData.status_id : update_form.sourceData.status_id}}',
		"assessment_id" = '{{update_form.fieldState.assessment_id.isVisible ? update_form.formData.assessment_id : update_form.sourceData.assessment_id}}',
		"location_id" = '{{update_form.fieldState.location_id.isVisible ? update_form.formData.location_id : update_form.sourceData.location_id}}',
		"programs_id" = '{{update_form.fieldState.programs_id.isVisible ? update_form.formData.programs_id : update_form.sourceData.programs_id}}',
		"contacts_id" = '{{update_form.fieldState.contacts_id.isVisible ? update_form.formData.contacts_id : update_form.sourceData.contacts_id}}'
	WHERE "event_id" = {{data_table.selectedRow.event_id}};
